text: Joseph A. Diclerico Jr. (January 30, 1941 â€“ April 2, 2022) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the Judge of the United States District Court for the District of New Hampshire from 1992 until his death. He was chief judge of that court from 1992 until 1997. He was nominated to the court by President George H. W. Bush. Diclerico Jr. was born in Lynn, Massachusetts. Diclerico Jr. died on April 2, 2022 in Concord, New Hampshire at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American judges Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts Category:Politicians from New Hampshire Category:Lawyers from New Hampshire Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Lynn, Massachusetts Category:People from Concord, New Hampshire
title: Joseph A. Diclerico Jr.
